00015 VRPNode::VRPNode()
00016 {
00022     int i;
00023 
00024     x = 0;
00025     y = 0;
00026     
00027     for(i = 0;i < MAX_NEIGHBORLIST_SIZE; i++)
00028     {
00029         this->neighbor_list[i].position = 0;
00030         this->neighbor_list[i].val = 0;
00031     }
00032     
00033     this->arrival_time=0;
00034     this->service_time=0;
00035     this->daily_demands=NULL;
00036     this->daily_service_times=NULL;
00037     this->num_days=1; // >1 for multi-day VRPs
00038     this->start_tw=-VRP_INFINITY;
00039     this->end_tw=VRP_INFINITY;
00040 
00041 }

00043 VRPNode::~VRPNode()
00044 {
00048 
00049     if(this->daily_demands)
00050         delete [] this->daily_demands;
00051     if(this->daily_service_times)
00052         delete [] this->daily_service_times;
00053 }
